title: 6.18 wont patch
body:
Everytime the patch gets to 2% it stops and this pops up

"unspecified error has occurred please check the logs for more information"

please help:(

replies.body: At this point, the patcher is trying to access game files but is being blocked.  I suggest going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is allowed.  This will get you fixed up!
